DOC.detailed_description: The study consist 30-day screening phase , 12-week placebo-controlled dose-titration phase , 16-week placebo-controlled efficacy assessment phase ( EAP ) . Participants complete 28 week study continue open-label safety extension phase 24 week investigational cinacalcet treatment .
